Thoughts

My very own blog :3 Why does the heading say "thoughts" you ask? Simple, I'm too lazy to rename it ;3 Expect lots of CS, ramblings about computer ideologies, dragon stuff, really anything I'm currently interested in and willing to write an entry about. Do note that this is a largely autogenerated page, held together by (dragon) blood, sweat and POSIX utilities. If you notice any bugs, hit me up on Matrix and I'll fix it 2-3 (dragon) business days ;3
